briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated Truong Tan Sang on his election as President of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Prime Minister of Norway Jens Stoltenberg
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev made a telephone call to Prime Minister of Norway Jens Stoltenberg to once again express his condolences to Prime Minister and King of Norway, and his solidarity with the people of the country.

title.info: Condolences to King and Prime Minister of Norway
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev expressed his condolences to King Harald V of Norway and Prime Minister of Norway Jens Stoltenberg in connection with the tragic events in the country.

title.info: Agreement on Security Cooperation in the Caspian Sea has been submitted to the State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted the Agreement on Security Cooperation in the Caspian Sea to the State Duma for ratification.

title.info: Condolences to President of Uzbekistan Islam Karimov
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a telegram to Islam Karimov expressing his condolences following an earthquake in Uzbekistan.

title.info: Press statement and answers to questions at a news conference following Russian-German interstate consultations
briefs: NA

title.info: Russian-German interstate consultations
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and German Chancellor Angela Merkel took part in the 13th round of Russian-German interstate consultations. Following the meeting, a package of documents on the future development of bilateral cooperation was signed.

title.info: Petersburg Dialogue Russian-German public forum
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and German Chancellor Angela Merkel attended the closing session of the XI Petersburg Dialogue Russian-German public forum. The theme of the session was "Citizens, society and the state: Partnership for modernisation."

title.info: Meeting with Russian and German business leaders
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and German Chancellor Angela Merkel took part in a working breakfast with representatives of Russian and German business communities.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev arrived in Hannover
briefs: Together with Federal Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel, the President of Russia is participating in Russian-German interstate consultations and the Petersburg Dialogue Russian-German public forum.

title.info: Laws ratifying agreements on common principles and rules of competition, coordinated principles of monetary policy and coordinated macroeconomic policy between Russia, Belarus and Kazakhstan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed federal laws ratifying Agreement on common principles and rules of competition, Agreement on coordinated principles of monetary policy and Agreement on coordinated macroeconomic policy.

title.info: Law ratifying agreement on common principles and rules for regulating the activity of natural monopolies
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement on Common Principles and Rules for Regulating the Activity of Natural Monopolies.

title.info: Congratulations to President of France Nicolas Sarkozy
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a congratulatory message to French President Nicolas Sarkozy on France’s national holiday, Bastille Day.

title.info: Presentation by foreign ambassadors of their letters of credence
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev received letters of credence from eleven new ambassadors to the Russian Federation from Argentina, Burundi, Vietnam, Zimbabwe, India, Rwanda, El Salvador, Vatican, Equatorial Guinea, Ethiopia and Japan.

title.info: Condolences to Prime Minister of India Manmohan Singh
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev expressed his condolences to Prime Minister of India Manmohan Singh following terrorist attacks in Mumbai.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Turkey Abdullah Gul
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Turkey Abdullah Gul on the Turkish side’s initiative.

title.info: Meeting with President of Switzerland Micheline Calmy-Rey
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of Switzerland Micheline Calmy-Rey took part in the ceremony inaugurating the new Shchurovsky Cement Plant in Moscow Region. The plant is owned by Swiss Holcim Group, and around 500 million euros were invested in its modernisation.

title.info: The thirteenth round of Russian-German intergovernmental consultations will take place in Hannover on July 18–19
briefs: As was agreed between Russia’s President and Germany’s Federal Chancellor, the thirteenth round of Russian-German intergovernmental consultations will take place in Hannover on July 18–19, with a summit meeting in which members of the two countries’ governments will take part.

title.info: Condolences to President of Cyprus Demetris Christofias
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of the Republic of Cyprus Demetris Christofias following the tragedy at the Evangelos Florakis Naval Base.

title.info: Condolences to Prime Minister of India Manmohan Singh
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to Prime Minister of India Manmohan Singh over the loss of life caused by railway accidents in the states of Assam and Uttar Pradesh.

title.info: Condolences to President of Bangladesh Zillur Rahman
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of the People’s Republic of Bangladesh Zillur Rahman following the death of schoolchildren in a traffic accident in the southeast of the country.

title.info: Condolences to President of Afghanistan Hamid Karzai
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of Afghanistan Hamid Karzai following the murder of his brother, head of the Kandahar Provincial Council, Ahmed Wali Karzai.

title.info: Presidential Chief of Staff Sergei Naryshkin’s working visit to the Republic of Austria
briefs: NA

title.info: Telephone conversation with US President Barack Obama
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of the United States of America Barack Obama.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Venezuela Hugo Chavez
briefs: NA

title.info: Congratulations to President of South Sudan Salvatore Kiir Mayardit
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a message to President of South Sudan Salvatore Kiir Mayardit congratulating him on the state’s independence.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych
briefs: NA

title.info: Condolences to President of Democratic Republic of the Congo Joseph Kabila
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of Democratic Republic of the Congo Joseph Kabila Kabange following the air crash in the east of the country, which caused numerous casualties.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych on his birthday.

title.info: Agreement on customs duties payment procedures for oil exported from Belarus beyond the Customs Union territory has been submitted to State Duma
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted to the State Duma for ratification the Agreement on Customs Duties (and Other Similar Duties, Taxes, and Levies) Payment and Deposit Procedures for Crude Oil and Certain Petroleum Products Exported from Belarus beyond the Customs Union Territory.

title.info: Meeting with participants of the Seliger 2011 National Youth Education Forum
briefs: The forum’s participants were interested in Dmitry Medvedev’s opinion on key issues in politics, innovative economy, the fight against crime, the environment and culture. The President also listened to their ideas and proposals, which the young people wanted to share with him.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Mongolia Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj
briefs: NA

title.info: Meeting with the permanent members of the Security Council
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev discussed domestic and foreign policy issues with the permanent members of the Security Council.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev.

title.info: On July 13, Dmitry Medvedev will meet with President of Switzerland Micheline Calmy-Rey
briefs: NA

title.info: Presidential Adviser Alexander Bedritsky held consultations with Deputy Chairman of China's National Development and Reform Commission Xie Zhenhua
briefs: Presidential Adviser and Special Presidential Envoy on Climate Change Alexander Bedritsky held consultations with the Deputy Chairman of China's National Development and Reform Commission, Minister Xie Zhenhua on expanding climate cooperation among the BRICS states.

title.info: Congratulations to President of the United States Barack Obama on Independence Day
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated President of the United States of America Barack Obama on Independence Day.

title.info: Meeting with President of the Republic of South Africa Jacob Zuma
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Jacob Zuma focused primarily on the situation in Libya and the search for peaceful means of settlement.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Belarus Alexander Lukashenko
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated President of the Republic of Belarus Alexander Lukashenko on the country’s national holiday, Independence Day.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of South Africa Jacob Zuma
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with South Africa's President Jacob Zuma.

title.info: Greetings to the Russian Culture Festival in Japan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his greetings to participants and guests of the Russian Culture Festival in Japan.

title.info: Directive on resuming electricity supplies to Belarus
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with Deputy Prime Minister Igor Sechin.

title.info: Congratulations to the Prime Minister and Governor General of Canada on the national holiday
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a message of congratulations to Canadian Prime Minister Stephen Harper and Canadian Governor General David Johnston on the country’s national holiday, Canada Day.

title.info: Message to President of Montenegro Filip Vujanovic
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a message to President of Montenegro Filip Vujanovic on the 300th anniversary of the establishment of political relations between Russia and Montenegro.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev warmly congratulated Serzh Sargsyan on his 57th birthday and wished him health and every success.

title.info: Ratification of agreement on common principles and rules for technical regulation in Customs Union nations
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement on Common Principles and Rules of Technical Regulation in the Republic of Belarus, the Republic of Kazakhstan, and the Russian Federation.

title.info: Ratification of agreement on state border between Russia and Azerbaijan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Azerbaijan on the State Border.

title.info: Ratification of Protocol No.5 between Russia and Armenia
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of Protocol No.5 between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Armenia on Amending the Agreement between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Armenia concerning the Russian Military Base in the Republic of Armenia of March 16, 1995.

title.info: The NATO-Russia Council’s permanent representatives will hold an away meeting on July 4
briefs: The NATO-Russia Council’s permanent representatives will hold an away meeting in Sochi on July 4, 2011.

title.info: Meeting with Presidents of Armenia and Azerbaijan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with President of the Republic of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan and President of the Republic of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev.

title.info: Meeting with permanent members of the Security Council
briefs: The meeting discussed various domestic and foreign policy issues, including military education reform.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of South Africa Jacob Zuma
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of South Africa Jacob Zuma.

title.info: Greetings to delegates at the Global Zero Movement’s conference
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his greetings to delegates at the Global Zero Movement’s conference.

title.info: Working meeting with presidential special representative for cooperation with African countries Mikhail Margelov
briefs: Mikhail Margelov reported to Dmitry Medvedev on his trip to North Africa, in particular the outcome of talks in Benghazi and Tripoli.

title.info: Presidents of Russia, Armenia, and Azerbaijan will hold a trilateral meeting in Kazan on June 24
briefs: NA

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev sent to State Duma for ratification lease agreement on Finland’s use of Russian section of Saimaa Canal
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent to the State Duma for ratification the Agreement between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Finland on Lease to Finland of the Russian Section of the Saimaa Canal and Adjoining Territory, and on Shipping through the Saimaa Canal, signed in Lappeenranta on May 27, 2010.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Czech Republic Vaclav Klaus
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated Vaclav Klaus on his 70th birthday and noted his contribution to the steady development in Russian-Czech relations. The two presidents also exchanged views on preparations for Mr Medvedev’s visit to the Czech Republic at the end of the year.

title.info: Meeting with President of Finland Tarja Halonen
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Tarja Halonen discussed topical issues of Russian-Finnish cooperation.

title.info: Meeting with representatives of Russian and Spanish businesses
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Spanish Prime Minister Jose Luis Rodriguez Zapatero met with Russian and Spanish business people. They discussed the prospects of bilateral cooperation in various economic sectors.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of Spain Jose Luis Rodriguez Zapatero
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Jose Luis Rodriguez Zapatero discussed topical issues of bilateral cooperation and prospects for Russia-EU cooperation.

title.info: Russian-French documents have been signed
briefs: A set of documents on cooperation between Russia and France were signed in Dmitry Medvedev’s presence within the framework of the St Petersburg International Economic Forum.

title.info: Meeting with acting Prime Minister of Belgium Yves Leterme
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with acting Prime Minister of Belgium Yves Leterme on the sidelines of the St Petersburg International Economic Forum.

title.info: Meeting with President of Sri Lanka Mahinda Rajapaksa
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with President of Sri Lanka Mahinda Rajapaksa on the sidelines of the St Petersburg Economic Forum.

title.info: Talks with President of China Hu Jintao
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Hu Jintao discussed bilateral cooperation in trade, the economy and humanitarian sphere, and international issues, in particular the situation in the Middle East and North Africa, and the options for resolving the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula.

title.info: News conference following Russian-Chinese talks
briefs: NA

title.info: Beginning of meeting with President of China Hu Jintao
briefs: NA

title.info: Amendments to Russia’s Merchant Shipping Code
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Amendments to the Merchant Shipping Code of the Russian Federation.

title.info: Protocol on amendments and addenda to Agreement on Customs Union Commission has been submitted to State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted to the State Duma for ratification the Protocol on amendments and addends to the Agreement on the Customs Union Commission.

title.info: Agreement on appeals to EurAsEC court by economic entities with disputes arising within Customs Union has been submitted to State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted to the State Duma for ratification the Agreement on Appeals to the Eurasian Economic Community Court by Economic Entities with Disputes arising within the Customs Union and Particularities in Legal Proceedings Therein.

title.info: Meeting with President of Afghanistan Hamid Karzai
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev discussed bilateral cooperation with Hamid Karzai, in particular, Russia’s involvement in rebuilding Afghanistan’s economy.

title.info: Meeting between the presidents of Russia, Kazakhstan, and Iran
briefs: The three presidents discussed the situation with the Iran’s nuclear programme and the need to maintain the nuclear weapons non-proliferation regime. Iran’s cooperation with the six-party group of international mediators, and making Tehran’s relations with the IAEA more transparent were among the issues discussed.

title.info: Tenth anniversary summit of Shanghai Cooperation Organisation
briefs: The summit’s agenda included regional security issues, combating drug trafficking, the situation in Afghanistan, and economic and humanitarian cooperation between the SCO member states.

title.info: Speech by Dmitry Medvedev at a meeting of the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation Council of Heads of State in expanded format
briefs: NA

title.info: Meeting with President of Kyrgyzstan Roza Otunbayeva
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had talks with President of Kyrgyzstan Roza Otunbayeva, during which the two leaders discussed the current state of bilateral relations.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev arrived in Astana for SCO summit
briefs: During the talks with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev, the two leaders discussed the agenda for the meeting of heads of the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation Member States to be held on Wednesday, June 15, as well as the achievements of Kazakhstan's presidency in the organisation.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Prime Minister of Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdogan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with Prime Minister of Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdogan.

title.info: Visit to Uzbekistan
briefs: During his working trip to Uzbekistan, Dmitry Medvedev met with President of Uzbekistan Islam Karimov. The two leaders discussed the prospects of bilateral cooperation in trade, the economy and humanitarian sphere, as well as current regional issues.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych
briefs: NA

title.info: Russia – EU Summit
briefs: Particular attention at the meeting was paid to trade and economic cooperation, ways to further develop the Partnership for Modernisation concept, and work on a new Russia-EU framework agreement.

title.info: President of China Hu Jintao will make a state visit to Russia on June 15-18
briefs: NA

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will take part in the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation summit on June 14-15
briefs: NA

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will make a working visit to Uzbekistan on June 14
briefs: The visit is at the invitation of President of the Republic of Uzbekistan Islam Karimov.

title.info: Agreement on creating conditions on financial markets for free movement of capital has been sent to State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent the agreement on creating conditions on financial markets for free movement of capital to the State Duma for ratification.

title.info: EU-Russia summit
briefs: The 27th EU-Russia Summit was held in Nizhny Novgorod. The main topics of the meeting were trade and economic cooperation, further development of the Partnership for Modernisation concept, and a framework agreement between Russia and the European Union. Other topics included the possibility of a visa-free regime, Russia’s accession to the WTO, and measures to overcome the effects of the global economic crisis.

title.info: The Russia-EU summit has begun in Nizhny Novgorod
briefs: NA

title.info: Telephone conversation with New Zealand Prime Minister John Key
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with New Zealand Prime Minister John Key.

title.info: Law ratifying agreement between Russia and Belarus on cooperation in radio electronic combat
briefs: The President signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Belarus on Cooperation in Radio Electronic Combat.

title.info: Congratulations to President-elect of Peru Ollanta Humala Tasso
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a message to Ollanta Humala Tasso congratulating him being elected President of the Republic of Peru.

title.info: Law on ratification of the protocol to the agreement between Russian and US governments on management and disposition of plutonium no longer required for defence purposes, signed in September 2006
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On the Ratification of the Protocol to the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the United States of America Concerning the Management and Disposition of Plutonium Designated as No Longer Required for Defence Purposes and Related Cooperation.

title.info: Law on ratification of the protocol to the agreement between Russian and US governments on management and disposition of plutonium no longer required for defence purposes
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On the Ratification of the Protocol to the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the United States of America Concerning the Management and Disposition of Plutonium Designated as No Longer Required for Defence Purposes and Related Cooperation, signed in Washington on April 13, 2010.

title.info: Law on ratification of agreement between Russian and US governments on management and disposition of plutonium no longer required for defence purposes
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On the Ratification of Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the United States of America Concerning the Management and Disposition of Plutonium Designated as No Longer Required for Defence Purposes and Related Cooperation.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev met with President of Equatorial Guinea Teodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo
briefs: The subjects discussed at the talks with Equatorial Guinea’s President, who is also Chairman of the African Union, included bilateral trade and economic cooperation, energy sector relations, and scientific and technical cooperation.

title.info: Agreement on common monetary policy principles has been sent to State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent the Agreement on Common Monetary Policy Principles to the State Duma for ratification.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Raul Castro
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of the State Council and the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba Raul Castro.

title.info: Meeting with Permanent Representative of Russia to the North Atlantic Treaty Organisation Dmitry Rogozin
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Permanent Representative of Russia to NATO and Special Envoy of the President for Interaction with NATO in Missile Defence Dmitry Rogozin specifically discussed the European missile defence issue.

title.info: Law on ratification of the agreement on rules for determining the country of origin of goods in the CIS
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement on Rules for Determining the Country of Origin of Goods in the Commonwealth of Independent States.

title.info: Law on ratification of the protocol on conditions for the transportation of certain goods within Customs Union
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Protocol on Certain Temporary Exemptions to the Common Customs Regime within the Customs Union Territory.

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a meeting with Israeli President Shimon Peres.

title.info: Meeting with Vice President of China Xi Jinping
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Xi Jinping discussed bilateral cooperation, first and foremost trade and economic cooperation, as well as current issues on the international agenda.

title.info: Trilateral meeting with Prime Minister of Italy Silvio Berlusconi and Vice President of the United States Joseph Biden
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev, Silvio Berlusconi and Joseph Biden examined the situation in the Middle East and Libya and Palestinian-Israeli peace settlement and exchanged views on contacts with the new leadership of Egypt.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of Italy Silvio Berlusconi
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Silvio Berlusconi reviewed bilateral cooperation and international issues, in particular the situation in the Middle East and Libya, as well as missile defence in Europe.

briefs: NA

briefs: The Russia-EU Summit will be held in Nizhny Novgorod.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev arrived in Italy for a two-day visit
briefs: On the first day of the visit, Russia's President met with President of the Italian Republic Giorgio Napolitano.

title.info: Law on Russia’s adherence to Convention on Civil Aspects of International Child Abduction
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Adherence of the Russian Federation to the Convention on Civil Aspects of International Child Abduction.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Italy on Republic Day
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a message of congratulations to President of the Republic of Italy Giorgio Napolitano on the country’s national holiday, Republic Day, and the 150th anniversary of Italy’s unification.

briefs: NA

title.info: Russian-Mongolian talks
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj discussed the development of political dialogue and promising areas of trade and economic cooperation,and exchanged views on international issues, including the situation  in Central and Southeast Asia.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will make a working visit to Italy on June 1 and 2, 2011
briefs: At the invitation of President of the Republic of Italy Giorgio Napolitano, Mr Medvedev will visit Rome to take part in the celebrations of the 150th anniversary of Italy’s unification as a single state.

title.info: Last respects to President of Abkhazia Sergei Bagapsh
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev paid tribute to the memory of President of the Republic of Abkhazia Sergei Bagapsh.

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev.

briefs: NA

title.info: Meeting with Gazprom CEO Alexei Miller
briefs: Alexei Miller reported to Dmitry Medvedev on gas supplies to the domestic market and European consumers. The discussion also focused on Russian-Ukrainian gas cooperation.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev on Republic Day, the country's national holiday
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a message of congratulations to President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev on Azerbaijan's national holiday, Republic Day.

title.info: News conference following the G8 Summit
briefs: Following the G8 summit, Dmitry Medvedev answered Russian and foreign journalists' questions.

title.info: The G8 summit has ended its work in Deauville
briefs: Key issues on the summit’s agenda included international security, joint effort in the fight against terrorism, nuclear security issues, the situation in the Middle East and North Africa, the consequences of the earthquake in Japan, and internet development and its impact on society and the economy.

title.info: President of Mongolia Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj will make an official visit to Russia on May 30 – June 3, 2011
briefs: Russian-Mongolian summit talks will take place on May 31, 2011.

title.info: Meeting with Federal Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with Angela Merkel on the sidelines of the G8 Summit.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of the United Kingdom David Cameron
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with Prime Minister of the United Kingdom David Cameron on the sidelines of the G8 Summit.

title.info: Joint statement by Presidents of Russia, France and the US on Nagorno-Karabakh conflict
briefs: NA

title.info: Meeting with President of the United States Barack Obama
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Barack Obama discussed the development of bilateral relations and the implementation of the New START Treaty, as well as the prospects for deploying a missile defence system, Russia's WTO accession and the situation in the Middle East and North Africa.

title.info: Meeting with President of France Nicolas Sarkozy
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with President of France Nicolas Sarkozy on the sidelines of the G8 Summit.

title.info: G8 Summit has begun in Deauville
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev arrived in France last night. The working meetings of the summit participants begin today.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated the leaders of African countries on Africa Day
briefs: NA

briefs: NA
