briefs: NA

title.info: Condolences to President of South Africa Jacob Zuma
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of South Africa Jacob Zuma following a train accident.

title.info: Meeting with Secretary General of the Council of Europe Thorbjorn Jagland
briefs: On the sidelines of the St Petersburg International Legal Forum Dmitry Medvedev met with Secretary General of the Council of Europe Thorbjorn Jagland.

title.info: Russian-Austrian talks
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of Austria Heinz Fischer discussed trade and economic ties, the implementation of joint projects in energy and transport, in particular the construction of the South Stream gas pipeline and the extension of a broad-gauge railway, as well as cooperation in science, technology and the humanitarian sphere.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Belarus Alexander Lukashenko
briefs: NA

title.info: Agreement on coordinated macroeconomic policies of the Customs Union member states has been submitted to the State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted to the State Duma for ratification the Agreement on Coordinated Macroeconomic Policies of the Customs Union Member States.

title.info: Meeting with President of Slovenia Danilo Turk
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of the Republic of Slovenia Danilo Turk discussed current international issues, in particular Russia’s European Security Treaty initiative, and possible solutions to a number of regional conflicts.

title.info: Condolences to President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to  President of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari following the large-scale terrorist attack in the Pakistani city of Charsadda.

title.info: Messages to heads of state of Russia-NATO Council members
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent messages to the heads of state of the Russia-NATO Council (NRC) members outlining the Russian Federation's position on antiballistic missile defence (ABM).

title.info: Meeting with President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Asif Ali Zardari discussed the prospects of the Russian-Pakistani relations and pressing international and regional issues, specifically focusing on coordination of efforts to counter international terrorism and on the situation in the Middle East.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with President of Austria Heinz Fischer on May 19, 2011
briefs: Federal President of the Republic of Austria Dr Heinz Fischer will pay an official visit to Russia on May 18–21, 2011 at President of Russia's invitation.

title.info: Meeting on security issues
briefs: Issues discussed at the meeting included, in particular, ensuring the safety of Russian citizens and representative offices abroad in emergency situations.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with President of Slovenia Danilo Turk on May 16, 2011
briefs: NA

title.info: Agreement on Common Principles and Rules for Technical Regulation in Customs Union Member States has been submitted to the State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted to the State Duma for ratification the Agreement on Common Principles and Rules for Technical Regulation in the Republic of Belarus, the Republic of Kazakhstan and the Russian Federation.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Mongolia Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj
briefs: The two leaders discussed current bilateral cooperation issues in light of the official visit by the Mongolian President to Russia scheduled for late May.

title.info: Ratification of Third Protocol Amending the Treaty of Amity and Cooperation in Southeast Asia
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Third Protocol Amending the Treaty of Amity and Cooperation in Southeast Asia.

title.info: Ratification of Agreement between Russia and Turkey on cooperation in peaceful use of nuclear energy
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement Between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the Republic of Turkey on Cooperation in the Peaceful Use of Nuclear Energy.

title.info: Meeting with Chinese Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China Yang Jiechi, currently on a visit to Russia.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari on May 12, 2011
briefs: The President of Pakistan will pay an official visit to Russia on May 11–14, 2011 at President of Russia's  invitation.

title.info: State border treaty between Russia and Azerbaijan has been submitted to the State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted to the State Duma for ratification the Treaty on the State Border Between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Azerbaijan.

title.info: Congratulations to Prince William of Wales on his wedding
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated HRH Prince William of Wales on his wedding.

title.info: Condolences to President of the USA
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of the United States Barack Obama following the storms in the USA’s southern states.

title.info: Visit to Ukraine
briefs: The Russian head of state took part in memorial events marking the 25th anniversary of the Chernobyl accident. During a meeting with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych, Dmitry Medvedev discussed the consequences of the Chernobyl disaster and providing social and medical assistance to emergency workers, as well as various aspects of Russian-Ukrainian cooperation.

title.info: Meeting with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Viktor Yanukovych discussed, in particular, the status of Chernobyl disaster consequences and the provision of social and medical assistance to the accident liquidators. The presidents of Russia and Ukraine also reviewed the most important issues of bilateral trade, economic and humanitarian cooperation.

title.info: Initiatives of the Russian President to develop an international system for safe and secure operation of nuclear power facilities
briefs: Russian President Dmitry Medvedev put forward proposals to further improve international legislation on the safety of nuclear power stations.

title.info: Memorial events in Chernobyl
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych took part in memorial events on the 25th anniversary of the Chernobyl disaster.

title.info: On implementing Presidential instructions to form an overall production and consumption balance for the key types of agricultural products, raw materials and food in Customs Union nations
briefs: NA

title.info: Meeting with OECD Secretary-General Angel Gurria
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev discussed with Angel Gurria the question of Russia’s accession to the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development and the World Trade Organisation.

title.info: Meeting with United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Ban Ki-moon discussed the state of affairs at the United Nations and the role of the organisation in ensuring international peace in the context of recent events in the Middle East, North and West Africa, and particularly in Libya and the Ivory Coast.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Prime Minister of Greece Georgios Papandreou
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with Prime Minister of the Hellenic Republic Georgios Papandreou.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Angela Merkel
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with Federal Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel.

title.info: Protocol on amendments to agreement on Russian military base in Armenia has been submitted to State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted to the State Duma for ratification Protocol No.5 dated March 16, 1995 between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Armenia on amendments to the agreement between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Armenia on the Russian military base in the Republic of Armenia.

title.info: Greetings to 1st Russian-Armenian Interregional Forum
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his greetings to participants and guests of the 1st Russian-Armenian Interregional Forum.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon on April 22, 2011
briefs: NA

title.info: Visit to Hong Kong
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev visited Hong Kong on what was the first visit by a Russian leader to the People’s Republic of China’s Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

title.info: Speech at meeting with Russian and Chinese business community representatives
briefs: NA

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev took part in the Boao Forum for Asia
briefs: Mr Medvedev addressed the forum with a speech on opportunities for economic cooperation between Russia and the Asia-Pacific region countries.

title.info: Meeting with President of Brazil Dilma Rousseff
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of the Federative Republic of Brazil Dilma Rousseff discussed the state and prospects of the Russian-Brazilian strategic partnership, specifically focusing on trade and economic cooperation and energy issues.

title.info: BRICS summit in China
briefs: Following the talks, the leaders of Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa, who took part in the summit, adopted a declaration assessing key aspects of the association’s cooperation. An agreement on BRICS inter-bank cooperation was also signed in the presence of the summit’s participants.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of India Manmohan Singh
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Manmohan Singh discussed trade and economic relations, energy sector and military technical cooperation, cooperation in medicine, telecommunications and transport, and humanitarian ties.

title.info: Meeting with President of the Republic of South Africa Jacob Zuma
briefs: The meeting between Dmitry Medvedev and Jacob Zuma took place on the BRICS summit’s sidelines.

title.info: Meeting with President of the People’s Republic of China Hu Jintao
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Hu Jintao discussed opportunities for promoting the strategic partnership in trade, economy, energy, and the military technical sector, strengthening cooperation between Russia and China within BRICS and the SCO, and also examined international and regional issues, in particular the situation in the Middle East and North Africa.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev arrived in China to take part in the BRICS summit and the Boao Forum for Asia
briefs: NA

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Uzbekistan Islam Karimov
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of the Republic of Uzbekistan Islam Karimov.

title.info: Interview by Dmitry Medvedev to China Central Television (CCTV)
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev gave an interview to China Central Television (CCTV) ahead of his visit to the People's Republic of China. The interview was recorded on April 7.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of Bavaria
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a brief meeting with Prime Minister of Bavaria Horst Seehofer.

title.info: Condolences to President of the Republic of Belarus
briefs: This evening, Dmitry Medvedev called President of the Republic of Belarus Alexander Lukashenko to express his deep condolences following the tragedy in the Minsk metro, where dozens of people were killed and injured by an explosion.

title.info: Trip to Smolensk Region
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev visited Smolensk Textile Factory and spoke to workers there. President of Russia had also a working meeting with Smolensk Region Governor Sergei Antufiev. Dmitry Medvedev and Bronislaw Komorowski paid tribute to the memory of the Smolensk tragedy victims. The heads of state laid wreaths at the monument marking the site of the crash of the Polish presidential plane one year ago. The two presidents also visited the Katyn memorial complex, where they laid wreaths at the Russian and Polish memorials.

title.info: Meeting with President of Poland Bronislaw Komorowski
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Bronislaw Komorowski paid tribute to the memory of the Smolensk tragedy victims. The heads of state laid wreaths at the monument marking the site of the crash of the Polish presidential plane one year ago.

title.info: Law on ratification of agreement between Russia and Belarus on establishing a unified communications system for the regional force grouping
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Belarus on Establishment and Operation of a Unified Communications System for the Regional Force (Army) Grouping of the Republic of Belarus and the Russian Federation.

title.info: Law on ratification of treaty between Russia and Norway on maritime delimitation
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Treaty between the Russian Federation and the Kingdom of Norway on Maritime Delimitation and Cooperation in the Barents Sea and the Arctic Ocean.

title.info: Law on ratification of agreements on specific provisions regarding the use of vehicles within the customs territory of the Customs Union and on provisions for movement of goods across the Customs Union border
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed federal laws ratifying two agreements concluded as part of the Customs Union’s legislative framework.

title.info: Executive order on presidential special representative for international energy cooperation
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed an executive order releasing Igor Yusufov from his duties as presidential special representative for international energy cooperation.

title.info: Message to the participants of the UN General Assembly session on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of Yuri Gagarin’s flight into space
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his greetings to the participants of the 65th special session of the UN General Assembly on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the first human mission into space.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Venezuela Hugo Chavez
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Venezuela Hugo Chavez.

title.info: Agreement on reciprocal visa-free travel by citizens of Russia and South Ossetia
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the Republic of South Ossetia on Reciprocal Visa-Free Travel by Citizens of the Russian Federation and the Republic of South Ossetia.

title.info: Agreement on reciprocal visa-free travel by citizens of Russia and Abkhazia
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the Republic of Abkhazia on Reciprocal Visa-Free Travel by Citizens of the Russian Federation and the Republic of Abkhazia.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will make a working visit to the People's Republic of China on April 13-17, 2011
briefs: NA

title.info: Meeting with King Abdullah II of Jordan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and King Abdullah II ibn Al Hussein reviewed the prospects for bilateral relations and current international issues, in particular ways to resolve the crisis in North Africa and the Middle East.

title.info: Law on developing Customs Union legal frameworks
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement on Specific Criminal and Administrative Liabilities for Breaching Customs Union and its Member-States Customs Legislations.

title.info: Amendments to law On Military Technical Cooperation between the Russian Federation and Foreign States
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Amendments to the Federal Law On Military Technical Cooperation between the Russian Federation and Foreign States.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Syria Bashar al-Assad
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Syria Bashar al-Assad.

title.info: Meeting with Crown Prince Philippe of Belgium
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with Crown Prince Philippe of Belgium, who arrived in Russia as head of the Belgian economic and trade delegation.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated Nursultan Nazarbayev on his re-election as president of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with King Abdullah II of Jordan on April 7, 2011
briefs: NA

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Belarus on Russia-Belarus Unity Day
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent President of Belarus Alexander Lukashenko a congratulatory message on the Day of Unity between the Peoples of the Russian Federation and the Republic of Belarus.

title.info: Condolences to family of Great Patriotic War veteran Vasily Kononov
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to the family of Great Patriotic War veteran and former Soviet partisan Vasily Kononov following Mr Kononov’s death.

title.info: Condolences to President of Namibia Hifikepunye Pohamba
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of Namibia Hifikepunye Pohamba following flooding in the country.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with Crown Prince Philippe of Belgium on April 5, 2011
briefs: From April 3 to 8, 2011, Prince Philippe will be in Russia on a working visit as head of the Belgian economic and trade delegation.

title.info: Meeting at the Kremlin with Emergencies Ministry rescuers who took part in the rescue operations in Japan
briefs: Acting on the President’s instructions, the rescuers worked in Sendai and Ishinomaki, the Japanese towns hardest hit by the earthquake and tsunami. The rescue operations took place on March 15-22, 2011.

title.info: Agreement between Russia and Belarus on cooperation in radio and electronic warfare has been submitted to State Duma for ratification
briefs: In line with paragraph d) of Article 84 of the Constitution of the Russian Federation and in accordance with the Federal Law On the International Treaties of the Russian Federation, Dmitry Medvedev submitted to the State Duma for ratification the Agreement between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Belarus on Cooperation in the Field of Radio and Electronic Warfare.

title.info: Condolences to President of Myanmar Thein Sein
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of Myanmar Thein Sein following the earthquake that struck the country.

title.info: Meeting with Foreign Minister of Saudi Arabia Prince Saud Al-Faisal Al-Saud
briefs: The current situation in the Middle East was the subject of discussion.

title.info: Agreement between Russia and Columbia on mutual legal assistance on criminal cases has been submitted to State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted to the State Duma for ratification the Agreement between Russia and Columbia on Mutual Legal Assistance on Criminal Cases.

title.info: Telephone conversation with US President Barack Obama
briefs: The telephone conversation took place at the initiative of the Russian side.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of Israel Benjamin Netanyahu
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Benjamin Netanyahu discussed bilateral relations between the two states and the situation in the Middle East and North Africa.

title.info: Meeting with US Secretary of Defence Robert Gates
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with United States Secretary of Defence Robert M. Gates.

title.info: Meeting with President of Palestinian National Authority Mahmoud Abbas
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and PNA President Mahmoud Abbas reviewed the current situation in the Middle East and topical issues of the Palestinian-Israeli dialogue.

title.info: Executive order on presidential special representative for Afghanistan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed an executive order appointing Zamir Kabulov as presidential special representative for Afghanistan.

title.info: Statement by Dmitry Medvedev on the situation in Libya
briefs: NA

title.info: Executive order on presidential special representative for cooperation with African countries
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed an executive order appointing Mikhail Margelov as presidential special representative for cooperation with African countries and releasing him from his duties as presidential special representative for Sudan.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with US Secretary of Defence Robert M. Gates on March 22, 2011
briefs: NA

title.info: Meeting with permanent members of the Security Council
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev heard reports by Emergencies Minister Sergei Shoigu and Rosatom State Corporation CEO Sergei Kiriyenko on the state of affairs in Japan following the natural disasters that hit the country, and also discussed the situation in Libya.

title.info: President of Poland Bronislaw Komorowski will visit Russia on April 11, 2011
briefs: NA

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on March 24, 2011
briefs: NA

title.info: President of the Palestinian National Authority Mahmoud Abbas will make a working visit to Russia on March 22-24
briefs: NA

title.info: Meeting with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Nursultan Nazarbayev reviewed the prospects for economic cooperation between the two states, in particular in the energy sector, as well as current issues on the regional and international agenda.

title.info: Meeting of High-Level Russian-Turkish Cooperation Council
briefs: Trade and economic ties development was among major topics at the Council meeting, co-chaired by the President of Russia and Prime Minister of Turkey.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdogan
briefs: Over a working dinner, Dmitry Medvedev and Recep Tayyip Erdogan discussed aspects of trade and economic cooperation between the two states, in particular in fuel and energy.

title.info: Agreement on transportation of cash across the Customs Union border has been submitted to State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted to the State Duma for ratification the Agreement on the Transportation of Cash and/or Cash Instruments by Individuals across the Customs Border of the Customs Union.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Iran Mahmoud Ahmadinejad
briefs: NA

title.info: Working meeting with Deputy Prime Minister Igor Sechin
briefs: Mr Sechin briefed the President on the work to draft a law on anti-terrorist protection of energy sector facilities and also discussed possibilities for assisting Japan in the aftermath of the earthquake and tsunami.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Prime Minister of Japan Naoto Kan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with Japanese Prime Minister Naoto Kan.

title.info: Emergencies Minister Sergei Shoigu briefed Dmitry Medvedev on the departure of two rescue teams to Japan
briefs: The Minister briefed the President by telephone about implementation of his instructions on aiding Japan in the disaster relief efforts following the earthquake.

title.info: Condolences to Prime Minister of Japan Naoto Kan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to Japanese Prime Minister Naoto Kan following the earthquake and tsunami that hit the country.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will hold talks with Turkish Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan
briefs: NA

title.info: Executive order on sanctions against Libya
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Executive Order On Measures to Implement UN Security Council Resolution 1970 of February 26, 2011.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych.

title.info: Meeting with Vice President of the United States of America Joseph Biden
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Joseph Biden discussed prospects for the development of Russian-US relations, Russia’s accession to the World Trade Organisation, and issues pertaining to European anti-missile defence.

title.info: Law on ratification of agreement between Russia and the United States on transit of military cargoes to Afghanistan via Russian territory
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the United States of America on Transit of Weapons, Military Equipment, Military Assets and Personnel via Russian Federation Territory in Connection with Participation by Armed Forces of the United States of America in Efforts to Maintain Security, Stabilise and Rehabilitate the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan.

title.info: President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev will make a working visit to Russia on March 17, 2011
briefs: NA

title.info: Law on ratification of agreement between Russia and Ukraine on protection of rocket and space technology
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine on Protection of Technology in Connection with Cooperation in the Peaceful Uses and Research of Outer Space and in Building and Operating Rockets and Rocket and Space Technology.

title.info: Law on ratification of agreement between Russia and Panama on mutual legal assistance
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Panama on Mutual Legal Assistance on Criminal Cases.

title.info: Law on ratification of agreement on establishing the Central Asian coordination centre for combating illegal drug trafficking
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Republic of Azerbaijan, the Republic of Kazakhstan, the Republic of Kyrgyzstan, the Russian Federation, the Republic of Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, and the Republic of Uzbekistan on Establishing the Central Asian Regional Information and Coordination Centre for Combating Illicit Trafficking of Narcotic Drugs, Psychotropic Substances, and their Precursors.

title.info: Meeting with Presidents of Armenia and Azerbaijan
briefs: Settlement of the Nagorno Karabakh conflict was discussed during talks between Dmitry Medvedev, President of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan and President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Bulgaria on the Day of Liberation from the Ottoman Yoke
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated President of Bulgaria Georgi Parvanov on the Day of Liberation from the Ottoman Yoke, the country’s national holiday.

title.info: Statute of the Court of the Eurasian Economic Community has been submitted to the State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted the Statute on the Court of the Eurasian Economic Community to the State Duma for ratification.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of the Republic of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with US Vice President Joseph Biden on March 9, 2011
briefs: NA

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with Presidents of Armenia and Azerbaijan on March 5, 2011
briefs: President of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan and President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev will arrive in Sochi on March 5, 2011, at the President of Russia’s invitation.

title.info: Statement by the President of Russia on the situation in Libya
briefs: NA

title.info: Meeting with President of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Serzh Sargsyan discussed various bilateral cooperation matters and current international issues.

title.info: Meeting with Russian and Spanish business community representatives
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and King Juan Carlos I of Spain discussed cooperation opportunities in the oil, gas, energy, transport infrastructure, light industry, and tourism sectors with Russian and Spanish business community representatives.

title.info: Protocol amending the Treaty of Amity and Cooperation in Southeast Asia has been submitted to the State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted the Third Protocol amending the Treaty of Amity and Cooperation in Southeast Asia to the State Duma for ratification.

title.info: Meeting with King Juan Carlos I of Spain
briefs: The President of Russia and the King of Spain discussed Russian-Spanish cooperation, as well as international issues, including the situation in the Middle East.

title.info: Emergencies Minister Sergei Shoigu briefed Dmitry Medvedev on evacuation of Russian citizens from Libya
briefs: Minister of Civil Defence, Emergencies and Disaster Relief Sergei Shoigu briefed the President on the second stage of the evacuation of Russian citizens from the ports of Sirte and Ras Lanuf in Libya.

title.info: Condolences to Prime Minister of New Zealand John Key
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to Prime Minister of New Zealand John Key following an earthquake.

title.info: Condolences to President of Estonia Toomas Hendrik Ilves
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of Estonia Toomas Hendrik Ilves following the deadly fire in a children’s home in Haapsalu.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with President of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan
briefs: The meeting will take place on February 25, 2011 in St Petersburg.

title.info: Visit to Vatican
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with Pope Benedict XVI and Vatican Secretary of State Tarcisio Bertone.

title.info: King Juan Carlos I of Spain and Queen Sophia will make a working visit to Russia
briefs: On February 25 President Medvedev and HM Juan Carlos I will take part in an opening ceremony for The Prado Museum at the State Hermitage exhibition which will launch the Year of Spain in Russia and Year of Russia in Spain.

title.info: Talks with Prime Minister of Italy Silvio Berlusconi
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Silvio Berlusconi discussed current international problems, as well as bilateral humanitarian and cultural cooperation.

title.info: Opening of Year of Russian Culture in Italy and Year of Italian Culture in Russia
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Prime Minister of Italy Silvio Berlusconi participated in an opening ceremony for the Year of Russian Culture and Language in Italy and Year of Italian Culture and Language in Russia.

title.info: Russian-Italian talks
briefs: Talks between Dmitry Medvedev and President of Italy Giorgio Napolitano were held in Rome.

title.info: Greetings to Russian-Italian Student Forum in Rome
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his greetings to participants and guests of the forum which is timed to coincide with the opening of the Year of Russian Culture and Language in Italy and the Year of Italian Culture and Language in Russia.

title.info: Chief of Staff of the Presidential Executive Office Sergei Naryshkin met with Japanese Foreign Minister Seiji Maehara
briefs: Mr Naryshkin received Japanese Minister of Foreign Affairs Seiji Maehara, who is in Moscow on a working visit.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Equatorial Guinea on his election as chairperson of the African Union
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated President of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea Teodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo on his election as chairperson of the African Union.

title.info: Statement by the President of Russia on the situation in Egypt
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev made a statement expressing the hope that democratic mechanisms will be swiftly restored in Egypt.

title.info: Russian-Norwegian Treaty on Maritime Delimitation has been submitted to the State Duma for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted a package of documents pertaining to the Treaty between the Russian Federation and the Kingdom of Norway on Maritime Delimitation and Cooperation in the Barents Sea and the Arctic Ocean, signed on September 15, 2010 in Murmansk, to the State Duma for ratification.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will make an official visit to Italy on February 16-17, 2011
briefs: The Russian President will visit Italy at the invitation of his Italian counterpart Giorgio Napolitano to take part in the opening ceremony of the Year of Russian Culture and Language in Italy and the Year of Italian Culture and Language in Russia.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of the Republic of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan.

title.info: Presentation by foreign ambassadors of their letters of credence
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev received letters of credence from ten new ambassadors to the Russian Federation from the Czech Republic, Gabon, Hungary, Italy, Kyrgyzstan, Malaysia, Poland, Sierra-Leone, the Republic of South Africa and Ukraine.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych.

title.info: Comments by Presidential Aide Sergei Prikhodko on Dmitry Medvedev’s visit to the Kuril Islands
briefs: In response to journalists’ questions about Russia’s reaction to the statements made by Japanese Prime Minister Naoto Kan regarding President of Russia Dmitry Medvedev’s recent visit to the Kuril Islands, Presidential Aide Sergei Prikhodko said:

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Egypt Hosni Mubarak
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of the Arab Republic of Egypt Hosni Mubarak.

title.info: Ratification of new START Treaty
briefs: Meeting with permanent members of the Russian Security Council, Dmitry Medvedev announced having signed the law ratifying the new START Treaty between the United States  and Russia that makes new cutbacks to the two countries’ strategic offensive weapons. Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov and US Secretary of State Hillary Clinton will exchange instruments of ratification very soon.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev addressed the World Economic Forum in Davos
briefs: The President spoke about his views of the situation in Russia and the world, the main principles of Russia’s modernisation strategy, and presented a number of Russia’s specific proposals and initiatives.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of Belgium Yves Leterme
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Yves Leterme discussed topical issues of trade and economic cooperation between Russia and Belgium, including in the energy sector.

title.info: Congratulations to President and Prime Minister of the Republic of India on Republic Day
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated President of India Pratibha Patil and Prime Minister of India Manmohan Singh on Republic Day, the country's national holiday.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of the United States Barack Obama
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of the United States Barack Obama.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Tajikistan Emomali Rahmon
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Tajikistan Emomali Rahmon, who expressed his sincere condolences following the terrorist attack at Domodedovo Airport, as well as solidarity with the leadership and people of Russia at this tragic moment.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev continues to receive condolences on the terrorist attack at Domodedovo Airport
briefs: A telephone conversation with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych took place this morning.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev is receiving condolences from foreign leaders and heads of international organisations
briefs: Numerous telephone calls have been initiated by heads of foreign states.

title.info: Meeting with Permanent Representative of Russia to the North Atlantic Treaty Organisation Dmitry Rogozin
briefs: Relations with NATO concerning antimissile defence and specifically the European antimissile shield were the subjects of discussion.

title.info: Meeting with member of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China Dai Bingguo
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Dai Bingguo discussed prospects for developing Russian-Chinese cooperation and joint coordination on the international arena.

title.info: Speech and answer to journalist’s question at news conference following Russian-Afghan talks
briefs: NA

title.info: Russian-Afghan talks
briefs: Talks between Dmitry Medvedev and Afghan President Hamid Karzai took place in the Kremlin.

title.info: Condolences to President of Israel Shimon Peres
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of Israel Shimon Peres following the passing of his wife, Sonya Peres.

title.info: Results of the visit to the Middle East
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev answered journalists’ questions on the outcome of his visit to Jordan and Palestine.

title.info: Visit to Jordan
briefs: Official talks between Dmitry Medvedev and King Abdullah II bin Al Hussein of Jordan were held in Amman.

title.info: Beginning of conversation with King Abdullah II of Jordan
briefs: NA

title.info: Visit to Jordan
briefs: Official talks between Dmitry Medvedev and King Abdullah II bin Al Hussein of Jordan were held in Amman. Following the talks, the President of Russia visited the Baptism Site of Jesus Christ historical and religious sanctuary on the Jordan River.

title.info: Visit to Palestinian Authority
briefs: Talks between the President of Russia and President of Palestinian Authority Mahmoud Abbas took place in Jericho. The main issue discussed during the meeting was Middle East settlement.

title.info: News conference following Russian-Palestinian talks
briefs: NA

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Iran
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Iran Mahmoud Ahmadinejad.

title.info: Presidents of Russia and Afghanistan will meet on January 21, 2011
briefs: President of the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan Hamid Karzai will make an official visit to Russia on January 21-22, 2011, at the invitation of Dmitry Medvedev.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will make working visits to Jordan and Palestine
briefs: President of Russia will visit the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan and the territories of the Palestinian National Authority on January 18 and 19, 2011.

title.info: Russian-American agreement on the transit of military equipment and personnel via Russian territory has been submitted to State Duma
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted to the State Duma for ratification the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the United States of America on Transit of Weapons, Military Equipment, Military Assets and Personnel via Russian Federation Territory in Connection with Participation by Armed Forces of the United States of America in Efforts to Maintain Security, Stabilise and Rehabilitate the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Poland Bronislaw Komorowski
briefs: NA

title.info: Condolences to President of Brazil Dilma Rousseff
briefs: NA

title.info: Condolences to Prime Minister of Australia Julia Gillard
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent condolences to Prime Minister of Australia Julia Gillard following the deaths and serious economic damage caused by ongoing floods in Australia.

title.info: Law on ratification of Russian-Japanese agreement on cooperation in peaceful use of nuclear energy
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of Japan on Cooperation in the Peaceful Use of Nuclear Energy.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych.

title.info: Law on ratification of Russian-Mongolian agreement on establishing Dornod Uranium joint venture
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of Mongolia on Establishing Joint Company with Limited Liability, Dornod Uranium.

title.info: Ratification of Protocol on amending the Customs Union agreement on veterinary and sanitary measures
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Protocol on Amendments to the Customs Union Agreement on Veterinary and Sanitary Measures dated December 11, 2009.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Israel Shimon Peres
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Israel Shimon Peres. The conversation took place at the Israeli side’s initiative.

title.info: Congratulatory message to President of Brazil Dilma Rousseff
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a congratulatory message to Dilma Vana Rousseff Linhares upon assuming presidency of the Federative Republic of Brazil.

title.info: Message to Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a message to Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva upon completion of his term as President of Brazil.

title.info: Condolences to President of Egypt Hosni Mubarak
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of the Arab Republic of Egypt Hosni Mubarak following a terrorist attack in Alexandria.

title.info: Congratulations to President Raul Castro on National Liberation Day
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated President of the State Council and the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba Raul Castro on National Liberation Day, the country’s national holiday.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Prime Minister of Italy Silvio Berlusconi
briefs: NA

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev sent New Year congratulations to foreign heads of state and government
briefs: NA

title.info: New Year reception at the Kremlin
briefs: Speaking at the New Year reception, Dmitry Medvedev noted that 2010 was marked by Russia’s overcoming the economic crisis with minimal losses.

title.info: Russia became one of the founding members of the International Anti-Corruption Academy
briefs: Agreement for the Establishment of the International Anti-Corruption Academy as an International Organisation was signed on December 29, 2010, in Vienna.

title.info: Law on ratification of Russian-Swiss agreement on simplifying visa regime
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Federal Council of the Swiss Confederation Simplifying the Issue of Visas to the Citizens of the Russian Federation and the Swiss Confederation.

title.info: Law on ratification of agreement on temporary labour migration between Russia and France
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the French Republic on Temporary Labour Activity of Citizens of One State on the Territory of the Other State.

title.info: Law on ratification of agreement on CSTO’s Collective Rapid Reaction Force
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement on the Collective Rapid Reaction Force of the Collective Security Treaty Organisation.

title.info: Law on ratification of agreement between Russia and Abkhazia on encouragement and reciprocal protection of investment
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the Republic of Abkhazia on Encouragement and Reciprocal Protection of Investments.

title.info: Law on ratification of agreement on building Black Sea Ring Highway
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Memorandum of Understanding on Coordinated Construction of the Black Sea Ring Highway.

title.info: Ratification of agreement between Russia and Spain on transit of military equipment and personnel across Russian territory
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the Kingdom of Spain on Transit of Military Equipment and Personnel via Russian Federation Territory in Connection with Participation by Armed Forces of the Kingdom of Spain in Efforts to Stabilise and Rehabilitate the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan.

title.info: Law on ratification of agreement between Russia and Belarus on defence cooperation
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Belarus on the Development of Defence Cooperation.

title.info: Ratification of agreement between Russia and France on transit of military equipment and personnel across Russian territory
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the French Republic on Transit of Military Equipment and Personnel via Russian Federation Territory in Connection with Participation by Armed Forces of the  French Republic in Efforts to Stabilise and Rehabilitate the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of France
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of France Nicolas Sarkozy.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Azerbaijan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev.

title.info: Telephone conversation with US President Barack Obama
briefs: The main subject of the conversation was the ratification by US Senate of the New START Treaty, with the point made that this event will consolidate the results of joint efforts to build a constructive and mutually respectful partnership with the USA.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev welcomes START treaty ratification by US Senate
briefs: NA

title.info: Meeting with students and teachers at the Indian Institute of Technology
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev visited the Indian Institute of Technology in Mumbai and met with students and teachers.

title.info: Official visit to India
briefs: Talks between Dmitry Medvedev and Indian Prime Minister Manmohan Singh were held in New Delhi.

title.info: News conference following Russian-Indian talks
briefs: NA

title.info: News conference following Russian-Latvian talks
briefs: NA

title.info: Russian-Latvian summit talks
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev held talks at the Kremlin with President of Lavtia Valdis Zatlers.

title.info: Interview to The Times of India newspaper
briefs: NA

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev on Independence Day, the country’s national holiday.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will make an official visit to India
briefs: NA

title.info: President of Latvia Valdis Zatlers will make an official visit to Russia
briefs: Summit talks will be held on December 20, 2010 in the Kremlin.

title.info: Agreement on Legal Assistance and Cooperation among Customs Union Member States has been submitted for ratification
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted to the State Duma for ratification the Agreement on Legal Assistance and Cooperation among Customs Union Member States in Investigating Criminal and Administrative Offences.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Turkmenistan Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedov
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated President of the Republic of Turkmenistan Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedov on Neutrality Day, the country’s national holiday.

title.info: Working visit by Chief of Staff of the Presidential Executive Office Sergei Naryshkin to Japan
briefs: Sergei Naryshkin made a working visit to Tokyo on December 9-10, 2010 and met with Japanese Prime Minister Naoto Kan, Chief Cabinet Secretary Yoshito Sengoku, former Prime Minister Yoshiro Mori, member of Parliament and former Prime Minister Yukio Hatoyama, public figures and business leaders.

title.info: Meeting of Council of CIS Heads of State
briefs: Summit participants discussed the outcomes of Russia’s presidency of the Commonwealth and identified priorities for the upcoming year.

title.info: Meeting of the Collective Security Treaty Organisation
briefs: Heads of the CSTO member states discussed the results of work in 2010. Raising the effectiveness of crisis-response mechanisms and strengthening the security of member countries and the region in general were the main subjects of attention.

title.info: Meeting with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev
briefs: Following Dmitry Medvedev’s talks with Mr Nazarbayev, the two presidents signed the Joint Action Plan for 2011-2012.

title.info: Meetings of the Supreme Governing Body of the Customs Union and Eurasian Economic Community Interstate Council
briefs: The presidents of Russia, Belarus and Kazakhstan adopted the Declaration on Forming the Common Economic Space.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of France
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with French Prime Minister Francois Fillon in the Kremlin.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of France
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of France Nicolas Sarkozy.

title.info: Visit to Belgium
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Belgian Prime Minister Yves Leterme discussed bilateral cooperation opportunities in trade, the economy, investment, high technology, energy, culture and sport.

title.info: Message to President of Sudan Omar Bashir
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a message to President of the Republic of Sudan Omar Bashir setting out Russia’s assessment of the processes taking place in Sudan in the run-up to the January referendum on the status of the country’s southern regions.

title.info: EU-Russia summit
briefs: The completion of talks between Russia and the European Union on Russia’s entering the World Trade Organisation was officially announced at the summit. Furthermore, priority attention was given to easing the visa regime for short trips by Russian citizens to the European Union, milestones were set for the subsequent integrated work in this area. The sides exchanged views on global energy security issues and energy cooperation between Russia and the EU. They touched on issues of improving the legal framework for energy cooperation.

title.info: Press statements following EU-Russia Summit
briefs: NA

title.info: EU-Russia summit held in Brussels
briefs: The Russian delegation was headed by Dmitry Medvedev; the European Union was represented by President of the European Council Herman Van Rompuy and President of the European Commission Jose Manuel Barroso.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Benjamin Netanyahu
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with Binyamin Netanyahu.

title.info: Working visit by Chief of Staff of the Presidential Executive Office Sergei Naryshkin to the Republic of Moldova
briefs: Sergei Naryshkin made a working visit to Chisinau on December 4-5, 2010 and met with the Moldovan leadership and the leaders of some political parties.

title.info: Russian-Polish Public Forum
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Bronislaw Komorowski took part in the Forum’s opening ceremony.

title.info: Russian-Polish talks
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of Poland Bronislaw Komorowski discussed cooperation in economic, energy, transport, and humanitarian sectors.

title.info: Interview to Polish media
briefs: NA

title.info: Telephone conversation with Benjamin Netanyahu
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with Prime Minister of Israel Benjamin Netanyahu.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Nursultan Nazarbayev
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev.

title.info: Russian-Italian interstate consultations
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi witnessed the signing of a package of bilateral agreements following Russian-Italian interstate consultations.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with Prime Minister of France Francois Fillon on December 9, 2010
briefs: Francois Fillon will be in Moscow on December 8 and 9, 2010 to take part in the official closing ceremony for the reciprocal year programmes between France and Russia.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Emir of Qatar
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with Emir of Qatar, Sheikh Hamad bin Khalifa Al-Thani.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will take part in multilateral integration organisations’ upcoming summits
briefs: The summits are set to take place on December 9–10, 2010 in Moscow.

title.info: More “Katyn case” documents revealed
briefs: As agreed between Dmitry Medvedev and Polish President Bronislaw Komorowski, Russia continues to reveal documents relating to the Katyn case (case No.159), launched by the Chief Military Prosecutor’s Office.

title.info: Russia’s Emergency Situations Ministry has been ordered to help Israel put out wildfires
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev instructed the Emergency Situations Ministry to send fire-fighting aircraft to Israel to help put out the wildfires in the Haifa area.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Prime Minister of Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdogan
briefs: NA

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of France Nicolas Sarkozy
briefs: NA

title.info: Ratification of agreement between Russia and Turkey on joint construction of Akkuyu NPP
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the Republic of Turkey on the Joint Construction of the Akkuyu Nuclear Power Plant in the Republic of Turkey.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev took part in the summit of the Organisation for Security and Cooperation in Europe
briefs: Addressing the summit’s plenary meeting, Mr Medvedev said the OSCE needs to modernise its work and form a clear legal base and universal rules for using the Organisation’s resources.

title.info: Beginning of meeting with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev
briefs: NA

title.info: Beginning of meeting with Prime Minister of the Netherlands Mark Rutte
briefs: NA

title.info: Speech at plenary meeting of the OSCE summit
briefs: NA

title.info: Presidential Address to the Federal Assembly of the Russian Federation
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev outlined his views on the main issues of the nation’s economic development, its social sphere, national political system, national security and defence.

title.info: Working visit by Chief of Staff of the Presidential Executive Office Sergei Naryshkin to Armenia
briefs: Chief of Staff of the Presidential Executive Office Sergei Naryshkin visited Yerevan at Armenia’s invitation.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will take part in the EU-Russia summit
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev will take part in the upcoming 26th EU-Russia summit in Brussels on December 7, 2010.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will make an official visit to Poland on December 6–7, 2010
briefs: NA

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Uzbekistan Islam Karimov
briefs: NA

title.info: Meeting of the Russian-Ukrainian Interstate Commission
briefs: The Russian-Ukrainian Interstate Commission’s latest meeting, the fourth so far and the second this year, discussed a broad range of bilateral economic, political and humanitarian relations. This was the tenth meeting between Dmitry Medvedev and Viktor Yanukovych this year.

title.info: Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi will make a working visit to Russia on December 3, 2010
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Silvio Berlusconi will chair the seventh round of top-level Russian-Italian interstate consultations in expanded format, with members of the two countries’ governments taking part.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will take part in the OSCE summit
briefs: Mr Medvedev will visit Kazakhstan on December 1-2, 2010, to take part in the Organisation for Security and Cooperation in Europe (OSCE) summit.

title.info: Meeting with Premier of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China Wen Jiabao
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Wen Jiabao discussed Russian-Chinese economic cooperation and its prospects.

title.info: Condolences to Prime Minister of New Zealand John Key
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to Prime Minister of New Zealand John Key following the tragedy at the Pike River mine.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with Prime Minister of China Wen Jiabao on November 24, 2010
briefs: Wen Jiabao is in Russia on an official visit to take part in the 15th regular meeting between the Chinese and Russian prime ministers.

title.info: Condolences to the King of Cambodia
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to Cambodia’s King Narodom Sihamoni following the tragic loss of life in Phnom Penh.

title.info: Meeting of the NATO-Russia Council
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev took part in a meeting of the NATO-Russia Council at the level of heads of state and government, whose main theme was Next Steps in NATO-Russia Cooperation. The Russian leader presented his proposals on building further cooperation between Russia and NATO.

title.info: Meeting with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Nursultan Nazarbayev discussed the upcoming OSCE summit in Astana and bilateral relations.

title.info: The third Caspian Summit
briefs: The summit, held in the capital of Azerbaijan, was attended by the heads of five littoral states: President of Russia Dmitry Medvedev, President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev, President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev, President of Turkmenistan Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedov, and President of Iran Mahmoud Ahmadinejad.

title.info: Meeting with President of Iran Mahmoud Ahmadinejad
briefs: The two heads of state discussed Iran’s nuclear programme and other issues.

title.info: Meeting with President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Ilham Aliyev reviewed issues of bilateral relations and further approaches to reaching settlement on the Nagorno Karabakh conflict.

title.info: Meeting with President of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan
briefs: The presidents of Russia and Armenia discussed prospects for developing bilateral relations, the regional agenda, and ways to settle the Nagorno Karabakh conflict.

title.info: Joint news conference following Russian-Slovenian talks
briefs: NA

title.info: Russian-Slovenian talks
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Slovenian President Danilo Turk discussed bilateral investment cooperation in the energy sector, including on the South Stream project, and trade and economic cooperation.

title.info: Beginning of meeting with President of Slovenia Danilo Turk
briefs: NA

title.info: Working visit by Chief of Staff of the Presidential Executive Office Sergei Naryshkin to France
briefs: NA

title.info: Ratification of agreement on exchange of information among member states of the Customs Union
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement on Requirements to Information Exchange among Customs Bodies and Other State Agencies of the Customs Union Member States.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of Lebanon Saad Hariri
briefs: The President of Russia and Prime Minister of Lebanon discussed, in particular, matters pertaining to further development and deepening of bilateral relations.

title.info: Treaty on Strategic Partnership between Russia and Egypt has been submitted to State Duma
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev submitted the Treaty on Strategic Partnership between Russia and Egypt to the State Duma for ratification.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Palestinian National Authority Mahmoud Abbas
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated President of the Palestinian National Authority Mahmoud Abbas on his 75th birthday.

title.info: APEC Summit
briefs: The two-day Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit has ended in Yokohama.

title.info: Meeting with US President Barack Obama
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with US President Barack Obama on the sidelines of the APEC Summit.

title.info: Congratulatory message to President of Uzbekistan Islam Karimov
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a congratulatory message to President of Uzbekistan Islam Karimov on the fifth anniversary of the signature of the Alliance Treaty between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Uzbekistan.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with President of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with President of the Republic of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan on November 17, 2010.

title.info: Meeting with President of Chile Sebastian Pinera
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with Sebastian Pinera on the sidelines of the APEC Summit.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of Japan Naoto Kan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with Naoto Kan on the sidelines of the APEC Summit.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Iraq Jalal Talabani
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated Jalal Talabani on his re-election as President of Iraq.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of New Zealand John Key
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and John Key made the decision to start drafting the agreement on free trade between Russia, Customs Union states and New Zealand.

title.info: APEC Summit
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev attended the APEC summit, taking part in the plenary meetings of the member countries’ heads of state and government, and in a meeting of the APEC leaders with the members of the APEC Business Advisory Council. The APEC leaders adopted a package of international documents. Mr Medvedev had a number of bilateral meetings on the summit’s sidelines, including a meeting with US President Barack Obama.

title.info: First day of the APEC Summit
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev took part in the APEC Summit. The first day’s agenda included a plenary meeting of the heads of APEC member states, a meeting of APEC leaders with the APEC Business Advisory Council members, and a number of bilateral meetings.

title.info: Condolences to President of Pakistan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari following a series of terrorist attacks that have caused much loss of life.

title.info: G20 Summit in Seoul
briefs: The G20 heads of state and government held a working session, focusing primarily on global economic issues, international trade, and climate change.

title.info: Meeting with President of China Hu Jintao
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of the People’s Republic of China Hu Jintao met on the sidelines of the G20 Summit.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of Australia Julia Gillard
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Julia Gillard exchanged ratification notes on the bilateral agreement on cooperation in the use of nuclear energy for peaceful purposes.

title.info: G20 summit
briefs: The G20 leaders focused primarily on global economic and international trade issues, and also climate change. The summit adopted a package of documents aimed at promoting economic growth. Dmitry Medvedev held several working meetings on the summit’s sidelines and also took part in the G20 Business Summit’s round table.

title.info: Meeting with Prime Minister of the United Kingdom David Cameron
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and David Cameron discussed various aspects of bilateral relations, as well as the situation in Iran and North Korea and other regional issues.

title.info: President of the Republic of Slovenia Danilo Turk will make an official visit to Russia on November 16–19, 2010
briefs: The summit talks will be held on November 17, 2010 in Moscow.

title.info: Russian and Korean civil society can play a major part in developing bilateral relations
briefs: This was Dmitry Medvedev’s main message at a meeting of the Korea-Russia Dialogue civil society forum.

title.info: Official visit to the Republic of Korea
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev held talks in Seoul with President of South Korea Lee Myung-bak.

title.info: Speech at the third meeting of the Korea-Russia forum
briefs: Addressing the Korea-Russia Business Dialogue in Seoul, Dmitry Medvedev said that Russia wants to encourage South Korean investment and considers South Korea one of its priority partners in the Asia-Pacific region.

title.info: Interview to South Korean media
briefs: NA

title.info: Russian-Finnish talks
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Tarja Halonen discussed a wide scope of issues, ranging from European security to specific bilateral projects.

briefs: NA

briefs: NA

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with President of Finland Tarja Halonen, who arrived in Russia on a state visit.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Nicolas Sarkozy
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of France Nicolas Sarkozy.

title.info: Ratification of Russian-Kazakhstani agreement on joint border controls
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the Republic of Kazakhstan on Cooperation in Performing Joint Border Controls along the Russian-Kazakhstani State Border.

title.info: Message to Prime Minister of Japan Naoto Kan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a response message to Prime Minister of Japan Naoto Kan thanking him for the invitation to take part in the 18th APEC Economic Leaders’ Meeting in Yokohama on November 13–14, 2010.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Nursultan Nazarbayev
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Afghanistan Hamid Karzai
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of Afghanistan Hamid Karzai. The presidents discussed topical issues pertaining to the implementation of agreements on developing cooperation between Russia and Afghanistan in bilateral and multilateral formats, which were reached at a meeting in Sochi in August this year.

title.info: Meeting with NATO Secretary General Anders Fogh Rasmussen
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Anders Fogh Rasmussen discussed the current state and perspectives of Russia-NATO relations.

title.info: Meeting with Emir of Qatar Sheikh Hamad bin Khalifa Al-Thani
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Sheikh Hamad bin Khalifa Al-Thani discussed bilateral economic ties and regional cooperation.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will visit South Korea and take part in G20 summit
briefs: The Russian leader will pay an official visit to the Republic of Korea on November 10–11, 2010 at the invitation of President of South Korea Lee Myung-bak.

title.info: Congratulations to President-Elect of Brazil Dilma Rousseff
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated President-Elect of the Federative Republic of Brazil Dilma Vana Rousseff Linhares.

title.info: Emir Hamad bin Khalifa Al-Thani will make an official visit to Russia on November 2-4, 2010
briefs: NA

title.info: Official visit to Vietnam
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev held talks in Hanoi with President of Vietnam Nguyen Minh Triet, following which the two countries signed more than ten bilateral agreements.

title.info: Meeting with Vietnamese graduates of Soviet and Russian universities
briefs: NA

title.info: Congratulations to President of South Ossetia Eduard Kokoity
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated President of South Ossetia Eduard Kokoity on his birthday.

title.info: Opening remarks at meeting with Vietnamese and Russian businesspeople
briefs: NA

title.info: Joint news conference following Russian-Vietnamese talks
briefs: NA

title.info: Opening remarks at Russian-Vietnamese talks in expanded format
briefs: NA

title.info: Condolences to Prime Minister of Thailand Abhisit Vejjajiva
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to Prime Minister of Thailand Abhisit Vejjajiva for the loss of many lives caused by severe flooding.

title.info: ASEAN-Russia summit
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met with leaders of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) member states: Brunei, Vietnam, Indonesia, Cambodia, Laos, Malaysia, Myanmar, Singapore, Thailand and the Philippines.

title.info: Speech at the Second ASEAN-Russia Summit
briefs: NA

title.info: Russia and Vietnam – Towards New Horizons of Cooperation
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev's article in Nhan Dan Newspaper.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with President of the United States of America Barack Obama
briefs: As previously agreed, the presidents of Russia and the US will hold a full-scale meeting on the sidelines of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit, which will be held in Yokohama on November 13–14, 2010.

title.info: Condolences to President of the Argentine Republic Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of the Argentine Republic Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner following the death of her spouse.

title.info: Meeting with Presidents of Armenia and Azerbaijan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev, President of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan, and President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev discussed future possibilities for reaching a settlement of the Nagorno-Karabakh conflict.

title.info: Condolences to President of Indonesia Susilo Bambang Yudohoyono
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President Susilo Yudohoyono following the earthquake and tsunami in Indonesia.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will take part in the ASEAN-Russia summit
briefs: The President will take part in the second summit between Russia and members of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) on October 30-31, 2010, in Hanoi and also make an official visit to the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Sudan Omar Bashir
briefs: NA

title.info: President of Finland Tarja Halonen will make a state visit to Russia on November 8–11, 2010
briefs: NA

title.info: Presidents of Armenia, Azerbaijan and Russia to meet in Astrakhan on October 27, 2010
briefs: President of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan and President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev will visit Russia at Dmitry Medvedev’s invitation. Nagorno-Karabakh settlement will be the subject of the trilateral meeting.

title.info: Russian-Turkmenistani talks
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of Turkmenistan Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedov discussed a broad range of bilateral cooperation issues, in particular trade and economic ties and joint projects in energy, agriculture, transport, telecommunications, and humanitarian sector, as well as a number of regional issues.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev arrived in Turkmenistan on a working visit
briefs: The first conversation between Dmitry Medvedev and President of Turkmenistan Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedov took place at the Turkmenbashi airport.

title.info: Meeting with participants in the Munich Conference on Security Policy
briefs: Participants exchanged views on a wide range of issues on the Euro-Atlantic agenda. Particular attention was given to the President of Russia’s initiative to sign a new European Security Treaty that would enshrine the principle of the indivisibility of security in the Euro-Atlantic area.

title.info: Joint news conference following Russian-French-German talks
briefs: NA

title.info: Russian-French-German talks
briefs: Talks between Dmitry Medvedev, Federal Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel and President of France Nicolas Sarkozy were held in Deauville, France. This is the first trilateral meeting of the leaders of Russia, France and Germany in five years.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev arrived in Deauville to participate in Russian-German-French summit
briefs: The main topic of the meeting between Dmitry Medvedev, President of France Nicolas Sarkozy, and Federal Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel will be building a system of an equal and indivisible security in the Euro-Atlantic and Eurasian regions that will allow for a collective response to common challenges and threats.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Nursultan Nazarbayev exchanged views on current aspects of bilateral cooperation, including joint efforts on the international and regional agenda.

title.info: Ratification of Russian-Japanese agreement on mutual legal assistance
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Russian Federation and Japan on Mutual Legal Assistance on Criminal Cases.

title.info: Ratification of Russian-Namibian agreement on protection of investments
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of the Republic of Namibia on Reciprocal Encouragement and Protection of Investments.

title.info: Presentation by foreign ambassadors of their letters of credence
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev received letters of credence from 13 new ambassadors to the Russian Federation.

title.info: Speech at presentation by foreign ambassadors of their letters of credence
briefs: NA

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will visit Turkmenistan on October 21-22, 2010
briefs: NA

title.info: Russian-Venezuelan talks
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of Venezuela Hugo Chavez discussed development of bilateral trade and economic relations, and current issues on the regional and international agendas.

title.info: Official visit to the Republic of Cyprus
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President Demetris Christofias discussed a wide range of issues, including cooperation in the economy, finance, tourism and humanitarian sphere. During his visit, Dmitry Medvedev met with President of the House of Representatives of Cyprus Marios Garoyian, leaders of parliamentary parties, and Chrysostomos II, Archbishop of New Justiniana and All Cyprus. Dmitry Medvedev also took part in the Cyprus-Russia Business Forum.

title.info: Official visit to the Republic of Cyprus
briefs: This is the first visit by a Russian leader to the Republic of Cyprus. The visit is timed to coincide with the 50th anniversary of establishing diplomatic relations between the two states.

title.info: Meeting with Russian and Chinese World War II veterans
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev began the first day of his official visit to China by visiting the Russian military cemetery in Lushun near the city of Dalian. The President laid flowers at the memorial to Soviet soldiers who fell liberating Northeast China from Japanese occupation, and met with Russian and Chinese World War II veterans.

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his greetings to delegates of the International Atomic Energy Agency’s 54th General Conference.

title.info: The Russian and Ukrainian presidents discussed cooperation in the border regions
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Viktor Yanukovych continued in Zavidovo (Tver Region) the talks they began in Ukraine’s Sumy Region on September 17, 2010.

title.info: The Russian and Ukrainian presidents had a meeting on Russian-Ukrainian migration policy
briefs: The two leaders discussed the situation with Russian-Ukrainian border crossing by the two nations’ citizens, involving border, customs, and migration control, and simplifying relevant procedures and improving border crossing points’ operation.

title.info: Condolences to President of Sri Lanka Mahinda Rajapaksa
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of Sri Lanka Mahinda Rajapaksa following a road accident that has caused many victims.

title.info: The Russian and Ukrainian presidents took part in one of the stages in the St Petersburg-Moscow-Kiev International Motor Rally
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and  Viktor Yanukovych took part in a stage of the international motor rally marking 100 years since the first Emperor Nicholas II Prize St Petersburg-Kiev Motor Rally took place.

title.info: Congratulations to Michelle Bachelet on her appointment as UN Under-Secretary-General
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated Michelle Bachelet on her appointment as UN Under-Secretary-General and head of the new UN entity for gender equality and the empowerment of women.

title.info: Russia and Norway have signed a treaty on the sea borders and on cooperation in the northern seas
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev said the signing of the Russian-Norwegian Treaty on Maritime Delimitation and Cooperation in the Barents Sea and the Arctic Ocean is a historic event that will influence the general situation in the region, strengthening international and regional security and intensifying cooperation between the Arctic countries.

title.info: Congratulations to Dmitry Medvedev from leaders of foreign nations

title.info: Telephone conversation with Federal Chancellor of Germany
briefs: Federal Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel expressed her best wishes and congratulated Dmitry Medvedev on his birthday.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Azerbaijan
briefs: President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev warmly congratulated Dmitry Medvedev on his birthday.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Kazakhstan
briefs: President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev extended his warm congratulations to Dmitry Medvedev on his birthday.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Armenia
briefs: President of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan sincerely congratulated Dmitry Medvedev on his birthday.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Ukraine

title.info: Meeting with President of the Republic of Korea Lee Myung-bak
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Lee Myung-bak discussed various aspects of bilateral cooperation, international and regional security issues, and preparations for the G20 summit in Seoul.

title.info: Meeting with Special Envoy of the Japanese Prime Minister Yukio Hatoyama

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Mary McAleese discussed various aspects of Russian-Irish cooperation, including trade, economic and humanitarian ties, and prospects for their development.

title.info: Telephone conversation with King of Spain Juan Carlos I
briefs: On behalf of the Spanish people, the King of Spain expressed solidarity and sympathy following the recent terrorist attacks in Russia. Dmitry Medvedev thanked King Juan Carlos I for his words of support.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev took part in the seventh Forum of Interregional Cooperation of Russia and Kazakhstan
briefs: The Forum's central theme is interaction between Russia and Kazakhstan in the sphere of sustainable development and high technology.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev and Nursultan Nazarbayev visited Russia-Kazakhstan Exhibition of Innovation Technology
briefs: The two leaders surveyed the information stands New Approaches to Kazakhstan’s Innovation Policy and Innovative Technology in Housing and Utilities, and visited Irgetas engineering laboratory.

briefs: On September 15, 2010, Prime Minister of the Kingdom of Norway Jens Stoltenberg will arrive in Murmansk where his talks with President Medvedev will take place.

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his congratulations to Acting President of Moldova and Speaker of the Moldovan Parliament Mihai Ghimpu on Moldova’s Independence Day holiday.

briefs: During the talks, Dmitry Medvedev and Doris Leuthard focused particularly on issues of bilateral economic cooperation, including energy and high technology.

title.info: Condolences to President of China Hu Jintao following plane crash in Yichun
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of China Hu Jintao following a plane crash in Yichun that claimed many lives.
