briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Jean-Claude Juncker discussed bilateral economic ties, humanitarian issues, the situation in Europe and relations between Russia and the European Union.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his congratulations to President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych on Independence Day, Ukraine's national holiday.

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev thanked the Turkish leadership and people for their help and support in the disaster relief efforts in Russia.

title.info: Meeting with President of Kyrgyzstan Roza Otunbayeva
briefs: The two leaders discussed the development of economic and humanitarian ties. The meeting took place on the sidelines of CSTO’s informal summit.

title.info: Informal CSTO summit took place in Yerevan
briefs: The heads of the Collective Security Treaty Organisation member states discussed CSTO’s current and planned measures for the stabilisation of the situation in Kyrgyzstan, and the creation of an effective crisis response system within the Organisation.

title.info: Beginning of informal meeting of CSTO heads of state
briefs: NA

title.info: Russian-Armenian talks
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan held talks in Yerevan. A number of agreements were signed, including on extending Russia’s right to station a military base in Armenia, and on construction of nuclear power plant units.

title.info: Joint news conference following Russian-Armenian talks
briefs: NA

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev arrived in Armenia on a state visit
briefs: The President of Russia laid a wreath at the Memorial to the victims of the 1915 Armenian genocide in the Ottoman Empire.

title.info: Meeting with President of Tajikistan Emomali Rahmon
briefs: Cooperation between Russia and Tajikistan in various domains, as well as mutual assistance following natural disasters were the subjects of discussion.

title.info: Meeting with presidents of Afghanistan, Pakistan and Tajikistan
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev discussed regional issues and ways of developing economic cooperation with President of Afghanistan Hamid Karzai, President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari, and President of Tajikistan Emomali Rahmon.

title.info: Congratulations to President of Namibia Hifikepunye Pohamba
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his congratulations to President of Namibia Hifikepunye Pohamba on his 75th birthday.

title.info: Meeting with President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari
briefs: The two Presidents reviewed the state of the political dialogue between Russia and Pakistan, looked at current bilateral cooperation issues and regional matters, and discussed cooperation on fighting terrorism, drug trafficking, and organised crime.

title.info: Meeting with President of Afghanistan Hamid Karzai
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev met in Sochi with President of Afghanistan Hamid Karzai. Economic and political cooperation were the main subjects of discussion. Mr Medvedev particularly noted the importance of joint efforts in fighting terrorism and drug trafficking.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will hold talks with Prime Minister of Luxembourg Jean-Claude Juncker
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Prime Minister of Luxembourg Jean-Claude Juncker will hold talks in Sochi on August 24, 2010.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of China Hu Jintao
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev had a telephone conversation with President of China Hu Jintao.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will make a state visit to Armenia on August 19–20, 2010
briefs: NA

title.info: Russia needs to remove legislative barriers impeding development of trade relations
briefs: The costs involved in crossing the customs border are sometimes unpredictable and discourage investors from opening new production facilities in Russia, Dmitry Medvedev said at a meeting on the country’s investment climate.

title.info: Four-party meeting between Dmitry Medvedev, Hamid Karzai, Asif Ali Zardari, and Emomali Rahmon
briefs: A four-party meeting will take place on August 18, 2010, between President of Russia Dmitry Medvedev, President of Afghanistan Hamid Karzai, President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari, and President of Tajikistan Emomali Rahmon.

title.info: Congratulations to Indian President Pratibha Patil and Prime Minister Manmohan Singh on India’s Independence Day national holiday
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his congratulations to Indian President Pratibha Patil and Prime Minister Manmohan Singh on the country’s Independence Day national holiday.

title.info: Russian-South Ossetian talks
briefs: The last two years have proven that Russia’s decision to defend the peoples of South Ossetia and Abkhazia and recognise the two countries’ independence was the right one, and it has given these peoples the chance to develop without fear of genocide and extermination, Dmitry Medvedev said at talks with President of South Ossetia Eduard Kokoity.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of the United States Barack Obama
briefs: The US President expressed his solidarity with Russia’s large-scale efforts of fire fighting and disaster relief, and his condolences following massive wildfires which caused loss of life and serious damage.

title.info: Telephone conversation with King of Spain Juan Carlos I
briefs: On behalf of all the Spanish people and on his own behalf the King of Spain expressed sincere sympathy following the natural disasters that have struck Russia, and his condolences with regard to the lives lost as a result of the forest fires.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will meet with President of South Ossetia Eduard Kokoity on August 13, 2010
briefs: The talks between the presidents of Russia and South Ossetia will be held in Sochi.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev thanked his Ukrainian counterpart for Ukraine’s assistance in fighting fires in Russia.

title.info: Condolences to President of China Hu Jintao
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of China Hu Jintao following the devastating mudslides there.

title.info: Working visit to Abkhazia
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev made a brief working visit to Abkhazia.

title.info: Condolences to President of India Pratibha Patil and Prime Minister of India Manmohan Singh
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a telegram expressing condolences to President of India Pratibha Patil and Prime Minister of India Manmohan Singh following a flood in northern India.

briefs: NA

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Uzbekistan Islam Karimov
briefs: NA

title.info: Joint news conference with President of South Africa Jacob Zuma
briefs: NA

title.info: Russian-South African talks
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of South Africa Jacob Zuma reviewed plans for joint trade and economic projects.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Armenia Serzh Sargsyan
briefs: The President of Armenia expressed solidarity and sympathy to the friendly Russian people following the nation’s major natural disasters.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Federal Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel
briefs: Angela Merkel expressed sincere sympathy and solidarity with the leadership and people of the Russian Federation following the major natural disasters that swept the country, as well as certainty that the measures taken by the President and the Government will allow taking the situation under firm control and launch emergency relief operations.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev
briefs: The President of Kazakhstan expressed solidarity with the people of Russia following the nation’s major natural disasters.

title.info: Congratulations to US President Barack Obama
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent US President Barack Obama a message of congratulations on his birthday.

title.info: Telephone conversation with Prime Minister of Spain Jose Luis Rodriguez Zapatero
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated Jose Luis Rodriguez Zapatero on his 50th anniversary.

title.info: Condolences to President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari and Prime Minister of Pakistan Yousaf Raza Gilani
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari and Prime Minister of Pakistan Yousaf Raza Gilani following widespread flooding that has claimed many lives.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych
briefs: On Ukraine’s initiative, Dmitry Medvedev and Viktor Yanukovych had a telephone conversation on August 1.

title.info: Ratification of agreement on mutual administrative assistance by customs authorities of Customs Union member states
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement on Mutual Administrative Assistance by Customs Authorities of the Customs Union Member States.

title.info: Ratification of agreement on encouragement and mutual protection of investments in Eurasian Economic Community (EurAsEC) member states
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement on the Encouragement and Mutual Protection of Investments in Eurasian Economic Community (EurAsEC) Member States.

title.info: Ratification of agreement with Government of Turkmenistan on encouragement and mutual protection of investments
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Law On Ratification of the Agreement Between the Government of the Russian Federation and the Government of Turkmenistan on the Encouragement and Mutually Protection of Investments.

title.info: Telephone conversation with President of Turkmenistan Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedov
briefs: The presidents of Russia and Turkmenistan discussed key issues of bilateral relations and noted the positive cooperation dynamics in several areas. Mr Medvedev and Mr Berdimuhamedov expressed their satisfaction with the work of the Intergovernmental Commission and the development of interregional ties, which is of major practical importance for the Russian-Turkmen relations.

title.info: Ratification of agreement on the establishment and application in the Customs Union of procedures for import customs duties transfer and distribution
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed law on ratification of agreement on the establishment and application in the Customs Union of procedures for import customs duties transfer and distribution.

title.info: Laws on ratifying agreements between the Government of the Russian Federation and the European Union on financing and implementing cross-border cooperation programmes
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed Federal Laws on ratifying agreements between the Government of the Russian Federation and the European Union on financing and implementing the Estonia-Latvia-Russia, Karelia, Lithuania-Poland-Russia, Southeast Finland-Russia, and Kolarctic cross-border cooperation programmes.

title.info: Condolences to President of Congo Joseph Kabila Kabange
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of the Democratic Republic of Congo Joseph Kabila Kabange following the capsizing of a ferry on the Kasai River.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will hold negotiations with President of South Africa Jacob Zuma on August 5, 2010, in Sochi
briefs: At Dmitry Medvedev's invitation, President of South Africa Jacob Zuma will make an official visit to Russia on August 4-6, 2010.

title.info: Condolences to President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari following a plane crash near Islamabad.

title.info: Condolences to Federal Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel following the tragedy in Duisburg
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to Federal Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel following the tragedy at the music festival in Duisburg.

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev held talks in Milan with Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi.

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev held talks in Milan with Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi.

briefs: NA

title.info: Meeting with President of Finland Tarja Halonen
briefs: The meeting between Dmitry Medvedev and Tarja Halonen took place at Kultaranta, the Finnish President's summer residence.

briefs: Russian-Finnish talks have taken place in Naantali. Dmitry Medvedev and President of Finland Tarja Halonen visited a scientific research centre on Seili Island in the Baltic Sea.

briefs: NA

title.info: Petersburg Dialogue Russian-German Public Forum
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and Angela Merkel took part in the Petersburg Dialogue Russian-German Public Forum aimed to promote ties between Russian and German civil societies.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev and Angela Merkel met with Russian and German business leaders
briefs: President Medvedev invited German businesses to take part in the modernisation of Russian companies.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev will make a working visit to Finland

title.info: Condolences to President of Uganda Yoweri Museveni

briefs: NA

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated Viktor Yanukovych on his 60th birthday and wished him success in his endeavours as President of Ukraine.

briefs: As agreed by the Russian President and German Federal Chancellor, the twelfth round of Russian-German summit level intergovernmental consultations will take place in Yekaterinburg on July 14-15, 2010.

briefs: Meetings of the Eurasian Economic Community (EurAsEc) Interstate Council and the Supreme Governing Body of the Customs Union between Russia, Belarus and Kazakhstan have taken place in Kazakhstan.

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent a telegram of condolences to President of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Joseph Kabila Kabanga following a deadly oil tanker blast.

title.info: Ratification of a merchant shipping agreement between Russia and Greece
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev signed a law ratifying a merchant shipping agreement between Russia and Greece.

title.info: Congratulations on Independence Day in Belarus
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev congratulated President of Belarus Alexander Lukashenko and all of the country’s people on the national holiday, Independence Day.

title.info: Condolences to President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his condolences to President of Pakistan Asif Ali Zardari following a terrorist attack at a mosque in the city of Lahore, in which dozens of innocent civilians were killed and injured.

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev sent his greetings to Canadian Prime Minister Stephen Harper and Governor General Michaelle Jean, congratulating them on Canada Day.

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev instructed Minister of Emergency Situations Sergei Shoigu to provide the necessary assistance to Ukraine to deal with the aftermath of the flood in the western and central areas of the nation.

briefs: The three leaders discussed common approaches to the issues on the G20 summit agenda and agreed to continue their trilateral consultations.

title.info: G8 summit has been held
briefs: The summit’s final plenary session took place with the participation of eight heads of state and government. The agenda included key issues of international security, joint fight against terrorism and the nuclear programmes of Iran and North Korea.

title.info: UK-Russia relations require adjustment and top-level attention
briefs: This was announced by Dmitry Medvedev following his meeting with Prime Minister of the United Kingdom David Cameron.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev met with the leaders of the US Senate and House of Representatives
briefs: Meeting with the Congress leaders, Mr Medvedev said he hoped that Russian and US lawmakers would follow their countries’ executive authorities in contributing to strengthening Russian-US relations.

briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of the United States Barack Obama discussed bilateral economic cooperation and Russia’s accession to the World Trade Organisation.

briefs: The agenda of the President’s upcoming visits to the United States and Canada and the G8 and G20 summits were discussed.

title.info: Russian-French talks
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of France Nicolas Sarkozy discussed investment cooperation in energy efficiency and energy saving, aircraft manufacturing and the automotive industry, nuclear energy and medicine, nano- and bio-technology. Opportunities for developing the two countries’ partnership in the humanitarian sector and science, and in education and culture were also discussed.

title.info: Official visit to Turkey
briefs: President Medvedev held talks with Turkish President Abdullah Gul, Turkish Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan and Speaker of the Grand National Assembly of Turkey Mehmet Ali Sahin. He also took part in Russian-Turkish Business Forum. The two sides put their signatures to a number of documents, including intergovernmental agreements on reciprocal visa requirements and nuclear power cooperation. The two leaders also signed the declaration on establishment of the High-Level Cooperation Council, the first meeting of which was held within a framework of Russian President’s official visit to Turkey.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev met with President of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner
briefs: Dmitry Medvedev and President of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner discussed projects in the most promising areas of cooperation between the two countries: Russian participation in building a nuclear power plant in Argentina, joint use of Russia’s GLONASS satellite navigation system, and Russia’s continued supply of icebreakers and helicopters for Argentine Antarctic expeditions. The two leaders also discussed diversifying bilateral trade.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev met with Russian and Argentine business community members
briefs: The President began his official visit to Argentina by meeting with Russian and Argentine business community members. Bilateral economic cooperation was the subject of discussion.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev met with representatives of US public, academic and political circles
briefs: The President answered questions on a variety of current issues, including international politics, security, the economy, the Iranian nuclear programme, and the situation in Afghanistan and Kyrgyzstan.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev met with President of Ukraine Viktor Yanukovych
briefs: The two leaders discussed the pricing of Russian natural gas supplies to Ukraine. Mr Medvedev noted that the subject is indeed very important for Ukraine and that Russia is ready to review Kiev’s new proposals regarding gas prices. He suggested having this matter addressed by the respective ministries of the two nations.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev met with King Abdullah II of Jordan
briefs: President Dmitry Medvedev and King Abdullah II discussed various issues of bilateral cooperation, pressing topics on the international agenda, and regional problems. In particular, the two leaders discussed prospects of bilateral cooperation in the economic and defence sectors, as well as humanitarian cooperation. Special attention was paid to the subject of a Middle East settlement.

title.info: High-level Russian-German intergovernmental consultations took place in Munich.
briefs: During their one-on-one talks Dmitry Medvedev and Federal Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel discussed the international political agenda in detail, talked about the results of the G8 summit [in L'Aquila], and exchanged views on the non-proliferation of weapons of mass destruction. In this context they also discussed the situation around Iran and North Korea.

title.info: Dmitry Medvedev approved a list of instructions drawn up following the G20 summit in London on April 1-2, 2009.
briefs: The Government, together with the Central Bank, has been instructed to submit proposals for improving Russia’s laws on supervision and regulation of financial markets, their instruments and participants, in order to fulfil the obligations made during the London summit.
